Content:
Throw the breach charge at a target position.
Detonating this charge breaks locks up to level 10 in a [1] radius, and knocking back objects within [2].

Throw the displacement charge at a target position.
Detonating this charge randomly teleports characters and barrels within [1] to another displacement charge within 12m.

Throw the remote charge at a target position.
Detonating this charge deals [1] in a [2] radius.

Throw the poison gas charge at a target position.
Detonating this charge deals [1] in a [2] radius and creates a poison cloud.

Throw the shrapnel charge at a target position.
Detonating this charge deals [1] in a [2] radius and applies Bleeding for 2 turns.
If targets hit are already bleeding, their wounds Rupture for [3].

Throw the tar charge at a target position.
Detonating this charge deals [1] in a [2] radius, turns water into oil, and applies Tarred for 2 turns.
Tarred reduces Fire Resistance, Movement Speed, and lets Burning bypass Magic Armor.
Retrieve a random remote charge from the <font color='#C7A758'>Demolitionist's Backpack</font>.

Detonate remote charges in a [1] radius.
Can target mines in the world, or an object holding mines.
Only 5 mines max can be detonated in an inventory.
